channel.title: Hey, more music
channel.description:
A while back I was on this site, but have forgotten the password and email address that I used here. This was back when the community project was to create a song. Well, I've finished that tune, as well as a few that are heavily inspired by the Black Mesa soundtrack itself. Hope you guys like it, and feel free to download it all.
Old BMS entry: [url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/6913874785464bb6/]Dread.mp3 - 9.64MB [Explicit][/url] [url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/69138627c7ec91ab/]Dread (Instrumental) (BM Source Entry).mp3 - 9.64MB[/url] [b][url='https://www.cagedrabbit.com/music/2q.zip']The album those two tracks are on[/url][/b] New updated version: [url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/69138909ba5cd894/]Dread.mp3 - 9.27MB[Explicit][/url]
Other BMS inspired music: [b][url='https://www.cagedrabbit.com/music/hexagon.zip']Hexagon (early 2009)[/url][/b] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/6913897945d937b4/]01 Scorched.mp3 - 7.13MB[/url] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/69138994acad4f40/]02 The Legend Of The Wizard And The Bard.mp3 - 5.11MB[/url] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/691390230da82a33/]03 Castle Horror.mp3 - 6.13MB[/url] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/6913905569e257d3/]04 Bridge To Another World.mp3 - 8.80MB[/url] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/69139077932ef457/]05 Bridge To Another World _Ver. 2_.mp3 - 8.36MB[/url] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/69139088038e1471/]06 Villian.mp3 - 5.34MB[/url] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/69139101903dd71d/]07 Moonlight.mp3 - 5.37MB[/url] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/69139122aa3010c4/]08 Simplistic.mp3 - 7.61MB[/url] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/691392508dd7061a/]09 Darkforce.mp3 - 6.46MB[/url] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/6913929384034a67/]10 Diablo.mp3 - 6.59MB[/url] -[url=https://www.zshare.net/audio/691393034e1efe0e/]11 Heartracing.mp3 - 4.59MB[/url]
The end of that album starts to drift away from BMS inspiration, but whatever. Let me know if I should upload more.

item.title: Hey, more music
item.dc:creator: Inou
item.description:
I’m gonna listen to this, because you’re awesome!

Read full topic

item.title: Hey, more music
item.dc:creator: redshojin
item.description:
Inou:

I just listened Bridge to Another World. This song is awesome! I loved the part with the guitar!

EDIT : I listened Hexagonal album entirely! Dude, you did awesome work! I loved you music!!! Thank you!!! Your name should be : Mr. Awesome! You should upload more of your work!

Thanks a bunch! I don’t have much time to upload every individual song, but I do have album zips that you can download, and for FREE. Two of them are up in the first post, but I’ve also got:

The Third Eclipse

If you really wanna make your ears bleed, here’s some much older stuff that’s pretty much crap.

How High Are We?
WGTHFT Promo 2008 (My band’s old promo. Very bad sounding.)
Hell Demo (More WGTHFT, even older and crappier.)

Octocat:

/respect.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey, more music
item.dc:creator: redshojin
item.description:
Patonki:

zShare streams really slow but from the 3 tracks I heard I can’t say much since it’s ambient. You could tone down the piano, or then your 3 piano-oriented songs just happened to be the 3 I listened to.

Possibly. I’d have to know which three you listened to.

item.title: Hey, more music
item.dc:creator: redshojin
item.description:
A while back I was on this site, but have forgotten the password and email address that I used here. This was back when the community project was to create a song. Well, I’ve finished that tune, as well as a few that are heavily inspired by the Black Mesa soundtrack itself. Hope you guys like it, and feel free to download it all.

Old BMS entry:
Dread.mp3 - 9.64MB [Explicit]
Dread (Instrumental) (BM Source Entry).mp3 - 9.64MB
The album those two tracks are on
New updated version:
Dread.mp3 - 9.27MB[Explicit]

Other BMS inspired music:
Hexagon (early 2009)
-01 Scorched.mp3 - 7.13MB
-02 The Legend Of The Wizard And The Bard.mp3 - 5.11MB
-03 Castle Horror.mp3 - 6.13MB
-04 Bridge To Another World.mp3 - 8.80MB
-05 Bridge To Another World Ver. 2.mp3 - 8.36MB
-06 Villian.mp3 - 5.34MB
-07 Moonlight.mp3 - 5.37MB
-08 Simplistic.mp3 - 7.61MB
-09 Darkforce.mp3 - 6.46MB
-10 Diablo.mp3 - 6.59MB
-11 Heartracing.mp3 - 4.59MB

The end of that album starts to drift away from BMS inspiration, but whatever. Let me know if I should upload more.
